author: kirschen
body: add precaution for deactivated HO (theHOIsUsed==false): set tower energy to tiny value to avoid nan-eta for HO-only towers (when HO is'deactivated', i.e. energy set to zero)
title: fix nan Calo-towers, when HO is deactivated, but has energy deposit (and ECAL/HCAL do not have any energy deposits)
